languages.text: "Хозяин велел передать, что... снарядил слугу аварийными средствами... чтобы он не причинил тебе вреда". {n}Даже погибая, монстр не в силах перестать произносить слова, вложенные в него предавшим создателем.{/n}

"The master has sent me to tell you that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm might come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop parroting the words of its treacherous master.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Хозяин велел передать, что... снарядил слугу аварийными средствами... чтобы он не причинил тебе вреда". {n}Даже погибая, монстр не в силах перестать произносить слова, вложенные в него предавшим создателем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The master told me to say that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm may come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop repeating the words of its treacherous master.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "The master has sent me to tell you that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm might come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop parroting the words of its treacherous master.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Le maître m'a demandé de vous dire qu'il... a équipé son serviteur d'un système de sécurité... pour qu'il ne puisse pas vous faire de mal. » {n}Même agonisant, le monstre ne peut s'empêcher de répéter les mots de son fourbe de maître.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The master has sent me to tell you that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm might come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop parroting the words of its treacherous master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le maître m'a demandé de vous dire qu'il... a équipé son serviteur d'un système de sécurité... pour qu'il ne puisse pas vous faire de mal. » {n}Même agonisant, le monstre ne peut s'empêcher de répéter les mots de son fourbe de maître.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “主人派我来告诉你，说……他为他所有的仆人都配备了应急措施……免得对你造成任何伤害。”{n}这只怪物即便已经奄奄一息，也依然在鹦鹉学舌，重复着它奸诈的主人说过的话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The master has sent me to tell you that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm might come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop parroting the words of its treacherous master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “主人派我来告诉你，说……他为他所有的仆人都配备了应急措施……免得对你造成任何伤害。”{n}这只怪物即便已经奄奄一息，也依然在鹦鹉学舌，重复着它奸诈的主人说过的话。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「我が主からのご伝言だ。我が主は…下僕たちに緊急の措置を施された…お前に危害が及ばないようにな」{n}死に瀕してもなお、怪物は裏切り者の主人の言葉をオウムのように繰り返している。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The master has sent me to tell you that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm might come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop parroting the words of its treacherous master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我が主からのご伝言だ。我が主は…下僕たちに緊急の措置を施された…お前に危害が及ばないようにな」{n}死に瀕してもなお、怪物は裏切り者の主人の言葉をオウムのように繰り返している。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Der Meister hat mich geschickt, um Euch zu sagen, dass er ... seinen Diener mit Notmaßnahmen versehen hat ... damit Euch nichts geschieht." {n}Selbst im Moment des Sterbens kann das Monster nicht anders, als die Worte seines hinterhältigen Meisters nachzubeten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The master has sent me to tell you that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm might come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop parroting the words of its treacherous master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Meister hat mich geschickt, um Euch zu sagen, dass er ... seinen Diener mit Notmaßnahmen versehen hat ... damit Euch nichts geschieht." {n}Selbst im Moment des Sterbens kann das Monster nicht anders, als die Worte seines hinterhältigen Meisters nachzubeten.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «El amo me envió para decirle que ha... equipado a su siervo con medidas de contingencia... para que no sufra usted ningún daño». {n}Incluso al morir, el monstruo es incapaz de no repetir las palabras de su traicionero amo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The master has sent me to tell you that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm might come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop parroting the words of its treacherous master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El amo me envió para decirle que ha... equipado a su siervo con medidas de contingencia... para que no sufra usted ningún daño». {n}Incluso al morir, el monstruo es incapaz de no repetir las palabras de su traicionero amo.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Efendim beni size şunu söylemem için gönderdi... Hizmetkârını acil durum önlemleriyle donatmış. Böylece kılınıza dahi zarar gelmeyecekmiş..." {n}Canavar, ölümün eşiğindeyken dahi bir papağan misali hain efendisinin sözlerini tekrar ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The master has sent me to tell you that he... equipped his servant with emergency measures... so that no harm might come to you." {n}Even as it dies, the monster is unable to stop parroting the words of its treacherous master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Efendim beni size şunu söylemem için gönderdi... Hizmetkârını acil durum önlemleriyle donatmış. Böylece kılınıza dahi zarar gelmeyecekmiş..." {n}Canavar, ölümün eşiğindeyken dahi bir papağan misali hain efendisinin sözlerini tekrar ediyor.{/n}
